name: Kids Basketball - Perfect Bullseye Trickshot
description:
+++ 24-hour Holiday discount! For you Kids 100% FREE! +++

“Different game modes”
“Beautiful Graphics”
“Awesome music”
___________________________________

Kids Basketball is an addictive iphone game designed specifically for the basketball fans. Come play basketball with kids and make the most of this basketball season. Make the most of your skill set and get the maximum baskets.

This game is definitely not that easy as it sounds. You need to shoot the ball in the basket from different impossible positions. On ladder top, wood trunks, you just name it. You’re sure to have ultimate fun and excitement. Show your skills and be the boss!

+++ GAME FEATURES +++
Different game modes
Multi-player game
Beautiful physics
Original sound and music
